bio: Archly is a project focused on enabling projects and users to operate across any chain. We do this through our ve(3,3) DEX and the Rainbow Road.
contributionDescription:
We built the Rainbow Road that allows for resources/data to be exchanged between chains in a fully permissionless and decentralized way. The Rainbow Road does this by abstracting away the needed integration with message passing protocols/services such as Chainlink CCIP, Axelar GMP, and LayerZero to provide a reliable, robust, and scalable platform to accomplish tasks across any chain.  This enables projects and users to:

- Transfer tokens to and from chains, like Base and Optimism
- Leverage services like Chainlink's Automation, VRF, Data Feeds on any chain
- Execute actions on remote chains

By lowering the barrier to go and operate cross-chain through the reduction of development costs, any project can bring their token(s) to Base or Optimism growing their community.

contributionLinks.description: Remotely executed contract to mint Arc for weekly emissions from any chain.
Chainlink Automation on Polygon initiating execution of remote contract on Base.
Execution passing through Axelar and invoking the remote contract on Base.
Resultiing actions taken on Base from Chainlink Automation started on Polygon.

impactDescription:
- The Rainbow Road has enabled users to migrate Arc tokens to and from Base and Optimism.

- Worked with team at Chainlink to open lanes between Base and Optimism for the Rainbow Road as well as other chains supported by Chainlink's CCIP and Archly.

- Enabled the ability to bring products and services from remote chains to Optimism and Base, such as Chainlink's Automation.

impactMetrics.description: # of txs on Base since launch on 10/19

pwCategorySuggestions: Cross-Chain Platforms, Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs), Smart Contract Platforms, Tokenization Platforms, Blockchain Infrastructure
